analysisEngineMetaData.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.tokit.PatternBasedTokenSegmenter
analysisEngineMetaData.description: Split up existing tokens again at particular split-chars. The prefix states whether the split chars should be added as separate Token Tokens. If the #INCLUDE_PREFIX precedes the split pattern, the pattern is included. Consequently, patterns following the #EXCLUDE_PREFIX, will not be added as a Token.

configurationParameter.name: deleteCover
configurationParameter.description:
Wether to remove the original token.
Default: true

configurationParameter.name: patterns
configurationParameter.description: A list of regular expressions, prefixed with #INCLUDE_PREFIX or #EXCLUDE_PREFIX. If neither of the prefixes is used, #EXCLUDE_PREFIX is assumed.
